name: proagent-ml-ai
description: Provectus ML & AI practice plugin for model training, inference optimization, MLOps pipelines, experiment tracking, prompt engineering, embeddings, vector stores, LLM application development, and RAG systems across AWS and GCP.
author: Provectus

skills.name: ml-ai-assistant
skills.description: Building ML & AI Systems - model training, inference, MLOps, experiment tracking, prompt engineering, embeddings, vector stores, LLM applications, RAG

agents.name: ml-ai-specialist
agents.description: Senior ML/AI engineer specializing in model training, deployment, MLOps, LLM applications, RAG systems, embeddings, and experiment tracking

commands.name: proagent-ml-ai-hub
commands.description: ML & AI practice hub - overview of capabilities and available operations

commands.name: proagent-ml-ai-run
commands.description: Execute ML/AI operations: train-model, build-pipeline, setup-experiment, create-embedding, deploy-model

commands.name: proagent-ml-ai-review
commands.description: Review model architecture, training pipeline, inference optimization, and data quality

hooks.description: Model validation checks and experiment logging enforcement
